skills.skill: Software Proficiency (AutoCAD, WMS, Pole Foreman, Design Manager)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical leadership and guidance to all Distribution group members.
Oversee the conversion of overhead electrical utility lines to underground through the SSUP program initiative.
Support the Engineering Manager by handling project assignments and managing project performance and customer relationships for the distribution team.
Coordinate task assignments to maximize staff utilization.
Review completed designs and design products to ensure compliance with client, industry, and regulatory requirements.
Effectively communicate with internal, client, and regulatory counterparts.
Identify and promote training opportunities. Approve timesheets and expense reports for direct reports and participate in annual performance reviews.

education_certification.credential: BS Degree or 4 years of formal post-high school specialized trade from an ABET-accredited school preferred.
Knowledge of NESC and other applicable codes and standards.
Willingness to learn and operate client-provided programs, systems, and software.
Proven history of successfully attaining results in a production environment.
Ability to travel up to 5 - 25% of the time to client sites.
